bug.author: lewfish
bug.description: When I run RASTER_VISION_DEBUG=1 ./scripts/run --aws I get <denchmark-code>... + docker run --rm -it -p 6006:6006 -v /Users/lfishgold/projects/raster-vision/src:/opt/src -v /Users/lfishgold/raster-vision-data:/opt/data raster-vision-cpu --aws docker: Error response from daemon: OCI runtime create failed: container_linux.go:348: starting container process caused "exec: \"--aws\": executable file not found in $PATH": unknown. </denchmark-code>
